mods.name: Satisfactory Mod Loader
mods.description: Required for ALL mods. Must be installed first.

mods.name: Pak Utility Mod
mods.description: Required dependency for most mods. Must be installed first.

mods.name: Mod Update Notifier
mods.description: Required by Additional_300_Inventory_Slots. Notifies of mod updates.

mods.name: Marcio Common Libs
mods.description: Required by Efficiency Checker Mod.

mods.name: MinoDabs Common Lib
mods.description: Required by Additional_300_Inventory_Slots.

mods.name: Modular UI
mods.description: Required by Refined Power and Ficsit Farming.

mods.name: Refined R&D API
mods.description: Required by Refined Power and Ficsit Farming.

mods.name: Refined R&D Lib
mods.description: Required by Refined Power and Ficsit Farming.

mods.name: avMall Lib
mods.description: Required by Item Dispenser.

mods.name: ContentLib
mods.description: Content library required by FlexSplines and other mods.

mods.name: Smart!
mods.description: Mass building of foundations, walls, and more

mods.name: Micro Manage
mods.description: Precise object positioning, rotation, and scaling

mods.name: Efficiency Checker Mod

mods.description: Unlimited nudge range for placing objects

mods.name: MiniMap
mods.description: In-game minimap for navigation

mods.description: Pass conveyors, pipes, power and hypertubes through floors and ceilings

mods.name: Conveyor Wall Hole
mods.description: Put a hole in the wall for conveyors wherever you want

mods.description: Machines with 4 power connections for daisy-chaining

mods.description: Aesthetic covered conveyor belts Mk1-6 with colors

mods.name: Wall Pipe Supports
mods.description: Additional variants of wall pipe supports

mods.name: Power Checker

mods.name: Ficsit Farming

mods.name: Mk++
